name: Not Enough
content: The sorrow if this hurts you
我感到很抱歉 如果这伤害了你
But I try to keep what we had once
我试图去保存我们曾经的回忆
When I said I want more
You were stealing me away oh
It’s not enough to give me
It’s not enough to get me
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh,
All the memories that were losing
你我之间的点点滴滴正在慢慢丢失
I think it’s running down the drain
我感觉得到你我间的一切正悄然褪色
别把事情变得如你想的那样艰难
It’s a lot easier than it seems yeah
It’s not enough to give me
It’s not enough to get me
And like I’m feeling I’m falling down
我能感觉到一切在慢慢坠落
I can see it’s starting to drown
我能看见关于你的一切开始被淹没
I can see it burning now
我能看见关于你的一切开始被燃尽
It’s not enough to give me
It’s not enough to get me
It’s not enough to give me
这还不够 不足以得到我的原谅
It’s not enough to get me
It’s not enough to get me
还不足够得到我的原谅
It’s not enough to get me~~~~~~
还不足够得到我的原谅
